creator: Deseret Book
descriptionHtml:
Search, study, and listen with Deseret Bookshelf. The app that gives you access to the largest eBook and audiobook library for Latter-day Saints. Brought to you by Deseret Book.

Start with 8 free eBooks and access to over 200 other free titles. Then you can either purchase individual ebooks, talks and audiobooks OR subscribe to Deseret Bookshelf PLUS+ and access the entire audiobook library and over 2,500 ebooks and talks.
Plus the entire Standard Works, Latter-day Saint lesson manuals, and General Conference talks. Latter-day Saint scripture references within eBooks are linked to the entire standard works, allowing you to easily explore scriptural connections within your library.

Listen or read your favorite titles anywhere by downloading any book in your library to your device. Great for commuting, road trips, flights, gardening or exercise.
With the Deseret Bookshelf, you can create several tabs, each with a different book, so that you can reference several books throughout your study without closing or losing your place in an open book. You can also save your study session, so you can pickup where you left off.

Your notes, highlights and tags are backed up and synced across all of your devices. You can also access Quote Vault, where you can opt-in to receive a daily quote. You can also create your own image quote memes from your favorite titles and share them with family and friends.

Shop our store for over 3,000 LDS eBook titles and over 1000 audiobook titles. Download many official Church publications for free, including curriculum materials and reference books.

Deseret Bookshelf PLUS+ includes access to every single Deseret Book audiobook and over 2500 ebooks and talks.

If you even need help, we're always available at downloads@deseretbook.com
descriptionShort: The largest LDS Audiobook and eBook library for all your devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version we have added the following:

* Fixed problems with displaying the last page of a chapter happening on some Android devices.

* Added the ability for a user to remove their Deseret Book account and all associated data.

* Fixed multiple smaller visual bugs.

Start with 8 free eBooks and access to over 200 other free titles. Then you can either purchase individual ebooks, talks and audiobooks OR subscribe to Deseret Bookshelf PLUS+ and access the entire audiobook library and over 2,500 ebooks and talks.
Plus the entire Standard Works, Latter-day Saint lesson manuals, and General Conference talks. Latter-day Saint scripture references within eBooks are linked to the entire standard works, allowing you to easily explore scriptural connections within your library.

Listen or read your favorite titles anywhere by downloading any book in your library to your device. Great for commuting, road trips, flights, gardening or exercise.
With the Deseret Bookshelf, you can create several tabs, each with a different book, so that you can reference several books throughout your study without closing or losing your place in an open book. You can also save your study session, so you can pickup where you left off.

Your notes, highlights and tags are backed up and synced across all of your devices. You can also access Quote Vault, where you can opt-in to receive a daily quote. You can also create your own image quote memes from your favorite titles and share them with family and friends.

Shop our store for over 3,000 LDS eBook titles and over 1000 audiobook titles. Download many official Church publications for free, including curriculum materials and reference books.

Deseret Bookshelf PLUS+ includes access to every single Deseret Book audiobook and over 2500 ebooks and talks.

If you even need help, we're always available at downloads@deseretbook.com
descriptionShort: The largest LDS Audiobook and eBook library for all your devices.

title: Deseret Bookshelf

container.value:
55 N 300 W STE 300
Salt Lake City, UT 84101

creator: Deseret Book
descriptionHtml:
Deseret Bookshelf – Deseret Book’s Library in Your Pocket

Search, study, read, and listen to uplifting, family-friendly content—all in one powerful app. The new Deseret Bookshelf is the most comprehensive source for wholesome eBooks, audiobooks, and podcasts for individuals and families alike.

Start with 8 free Latter-day Saint eBooks and unlock access to hundreds more—all at no cost. Your Library keeps all your Deseret Book purchases in one convenient place. Subscribe to Deseret Bookshelf+ for unlimited access to a wide-ranging collection of gospel, fiction, and nonfiction titles—including romance, suspense, inspirational voices, Church history, and more. That’s over 4,000 eBooks and the full audiobook catalog in one app.

Key Features

Wholesome Content

- Discover uplifting content that inspires faith, joy, and purpose.
- Curated for all ages—perfect for personal study and family time.
- Listen to audiobooks and talks from trusted Latter-day Saint voices.
- Enjoy clean stories with meaningful, family-centered themes.

Discover & Search

- Browse thousands of inspiring eBooks and audiobooks by genre or theme.
- Explore rich categories like gospel study, romance, fantasy, and suspense.
- Stream gospel-focused podcasts with insights from Church members and leaders.
- Find content quickly with smart filters and universal search.
- Follow beloved authors and access their most popular works.

eBook Reader & Study Tools

- Customize fonts, spacing, and light/dark modes to suit your reading style.
- Choose between scroll or page-flip mode.
- Highlight passages, bookmark favorites, and add personal notes.
- Tap scripture references to view linked verses instantly in context.
- Sync your markups and progress across all your devices.

Audiobook Player

- Listen to over 2,500 professionally narrated audiobooks and talks.
- Use chapter skip, 30-second rewind/forward, playback speed control, and sleep timer.
- Enjoy full background listening and cross-device syncing.
- New mini player keeps audio controls accessible while you browse.

Podcasts

- Subscribe to uplifting Latter-day Saint podcasts.
- Manage episodes with auto-playback and library organization.
- Download for offline listening or stream anywhere.
- Control playback speed to listen at your preferred pace.

Inspiration & Sharing

- Start your day with a new, uplifting quote.
- Share highlights or passages with friends via text, email, or social media.
- Let others know what books and authors are inspiring your journey.

Free Starter Library

Create an account and instantly receive 8 classic Latter-day Saint titles:

1. All These Things Shall Give Thee Experience – Neal A. Maxwell
2. The Power of Everyday Missionaries – Clayton M. Christensen
3. The Beginning of Better Days – Sheri Dew & Virginia Pearce
4. Be Your Best Self – Thomas S. Monson
5. Jesus the Christ – James E. Talmage
6. Lectures on Faith – Joseph Smith
7. The Joseph Smith Papers – Joseph Smith
8. Gospel Doctrine – Joseph F. Smith

You’ll also get access to the Standard Works, Church manuals, General Conference talks, and official Church publications—all included at no cost.

Deseret Bookshelf+ Subscription

Unlock unlimited access to:

- The full Deseret Book audiobook collection
- Thousands of premium and exclusive eBooks
- The subscriber-only “Sunday on Monday” podcast
- New titles added regularly

Whether you’re commuting, studying, or winding down at night, Deseret Bookshelf helps you stay spiritually nourished with uplifting content—anytime, anywhere.

Download now and experience the joy of wholesome reading and listening.
descriptionShort: Uplifting LDS eBooks, audiobooks, and podcasts—anytime, anywhere.
